interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2019/11/20
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Alberto Negrin'], 'Producers': ['Fulvio Lucisano', 'Paola Lucisano', 'Christian Mercuri', 'John Thompson'], 'Starring': ['Rosabell Laurenti Sellers', 'Mari Nagy', 'Moni Ovadia'], 'Studio': ['FilmRise']}
Review Text: this was no where near the true facts as it was heart felt...it left me feeling sad that was some writers imagination and fantasy about what may have happened to anne....after reading and watching many of the real facts this was purely someones creative writing....as it was a good story that is exactly what it was while moving had  not true basis at all  starting right at the beginning as to how  they were found...just left me lost...it played like  total fiction
Review Title: movie
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

The War Bride
Drama, Historical, Romance
['English seamstress Lily (Anna Friel) marries and has a child with a Canadian soldier, but their new life is shattered when he ships out to fight in WWII. Shortly after, Lily and her newborn daughter are invited to come and live with his family in Canada, where conditions are not as splendid as he had described.']

Herman's House
Documentary, Drama
['Herman Wallace may be the longest-serving prisoner in solitary confinement in America - 40 years and counting in a 6-by-9-foot cell. This award-winning documentary is a moving account of the remarkable expression his struggle finds in an unusual art project.']
